import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const Food = () => { const params = useParams(); const [food, setFood] = useState([ { name: "Cake", price: "500", qty: 1, dis: "Words that best describe Pizza: Tasty: Satisfying: Versatile: Delicious: Crispy: Cheesy: Crave-worthy: Aromatic: Mouth-watering: Tempting: Comforting: Quick: ...", image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/291528/pexels-photo-291528.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=600" }, { name: "Milk", price: "60", qty: 1, dis: "Words that best describe Pizza: Tasty: Satisfying: Versatile: Delicious: Crispy: Cheesy: Crave-worthy: Aromatic: Mouth-watering: Tempting: Comforting: Quick: ...", image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/5840409/pexels-photo-5840409.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=600" }, { name: "Pizza", price: "200", qty: 1, dis: "Words that best describe Pizza: Tasty: Satisfying: Versatile: Delicious: Crispy: Cheesy: Crave-worthy: Aromatic: Mouth-watering: Tempting: Comforting: Quick: ...", image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/905847/pexels-photo-905847.jpeg" }, { name: "Bread", price: "130", qty: 1, dis: "Words that best describe Pizza: Tasty: Satisfying: Versatile: Delicious: Crispy: Cheesy: Crave-worthy: Aromatic: Mouth-watering: Tempting: Comforting: Quick: ...", image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/1586947/pexels-photo-1586947.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800" }, { name: "Biscuit", price: "30", qty: 1, dis: "Words that best describe Pizza: Tasty: Satisfying: Versatile: Delicious: Crispy: Cheesy: Crave-worthy: Aromatic: Mouth-watering: Tempting: Comforting: Quick: ...", image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/28895988/pexels-photo-28895988/free-photo-of-delicious-cheesecake-with-lotus-biscuit-topping.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=600" } ]) return (

FOOD LIST

{ food.map((data, index) => ( <>
Name :

{data.name}

Price :

{data.price}

Qty :

{data.qty}

Discription:

{data.dis}

Last updated 3 mins ago

)) }
) } export default Food;
